author: seputaes (sep#0001)
name: Soapbox
install_msg: Thanks for installing Sep's Soapbox! **WARNING:** Configuring Soapbox will ***delete*** all empty voice channels which end with the default suffix. To see a list of channels it would delete, type `[p]soapbox check`.
short: Soapbox allows users to generate temporary voice channels by entering a specific voice channel.
description: Soapbox allows users to generate temporary voice channels by entering a specified voice channel. When that temporary voice channel is empty, it will be automatically deleted.
